00013 #ifndef PLANE_H
00014 #define PLANE_H
00015 
00016 #include <gtl/gtl.hpp>
00017 #include <gtl/vec3.hpp>
00018 #include <gtl/ray.hpp>
00019 #include <gtl/matrix4.hpp>
00020 
00021 namespace gtl
00022 {
00023     // forward declaration      
00024     template<typename Type> class Ray;
00025 
00035     template<typename Type>
00036     class Plane
00037     {
00038     public:
00040         Plane(){}
00041 
00043         Plane(const Vec3<Type> & a_normal, Type a_distance)
00044         {
00045             m_normal = a_normal;
00046             m_normal.normalize();
00047             m_distance = a_distance;
00048         }
00049 
00051         Plane(const Vec3<Type> & a_normal, const Vec3<Type> & a_pt)
00052         {
00053             m_normal = a_normal;
00054             m_normal.normalize();
00055             m_distance = m_normal.dot(a_pt);    
00056         }
00057 
00059         Plane(const Vec3<Type> & a_pt1, const Vec3<Type> & a_pt2, const Vec3<Type> & a_pt3)
00060         {
00061             m_normal = (a_pt2 - a_pt1).cross(a_pt3 - a_pt1);
00062             m_normal.normalize();
00063             m_distance = m_normal.dot(a_pt1);
00064         }
00065 
00067         Plane(const std::vector< Vec3<Type> > & points)
00068         {
00069             if(points.empty()) return;
00070 
00071             // "Newell's Method for Computing the Plane Equation of a Polygon",
00072             // Graphics Gems III, Academic Press (1992), pp.231-232.
00073             m_normal.setValue(0,0,0);
00074             Vec3<Type> refpt(0,0,0);
00075 
00076             // Compute the polygon normal and a reference point on
00077             // the plane. Note that the actual reference point is
00078             // refpt / nverts
00079             for(unsigned int i=0; i<points.size(); i++){
00080                 const Vec3<Type> & u = points[i];
00081                 const Vec3<Type> & v = points[(i+1)%points.size()];
00082 
00083                 m_normal[0] += (u[1] - v[1]) * (u[2] + v[2]);
00084                 m_normal[1] += (u[2] - v[2]) * (u[0] + v[0]);
00085                 m_normal[2] += (u[0] - v[0]) * (u[1] + v[1]);
00086 
00087                 refpt += u;
00088             }
00089 
00090             // Compute the distance from origin to the plane equation
00091             m_distance = -refpt.dot(m_normal) / (m_normal.length() * points.size());
00092         }
00093 
00095         virtual ~Plane(){}
00096 
00098         void setNormal(const Vec3<Type> & a_normal)
00099         { 
00100             m_normal = a_normal; 
00101         }
00102 
00104         const Vec3<Type> & getNormal() const
00105         { 
00106             return m_normal; 
00107         }
00108 
00110         void setDistance(Type a_distance)
00111         { 
00112             m_distance = a_distance; 
00113         }
00114 
00116         void setValue(Type a, Type b, Type c, Type w)
00117         {
00118             m_normal.setValue(a,b,c);
00119             m_normal.normalize();
00120 
00121             m_distance = -w;
00122         }
00123 
00125         Type getDistanceFromOrigin() const
00126         { 
00127             return m_distance; 
00128         }
00129 
00131         Type getDistance(const Vec3<Type> & a_point) const
00132         {
00133             return a_point.dot(m_normal) - m_distance;
00134         }
00135 
00137         bool isInHalfSpace(const Vec3<Type> & a_point) const
00138         {
00139             return (a_point.dot(m_normal) >= m_distance);
00140         }
00141 
00143         void transform(const Matrix4<Type> & a_matrix)
00144         {
00145             // Find the point on the plane along the normal from the origin
00146             Vec3<Type> point = m_distance * m_normal;
00147 
00148             // Transform the plane normal by the matrix to get the new normal.
00149             // Use the inverse transpose of the matrix so that normals are not scaled incorrectly.
00150             Matrix4<Type> invTran = a_matrix.inverse().transpose();
00151             invTran.multDirMatrix(m_normal, m_normal);
00152             m_normal.normalize();
00153 
00154             // Transform the point by the matrix
00155             a_matrix.multVecMatrix(point, point);
00156 
00157             // The new distance is the projected distance of the vector to the
00158             // transformed point onto the (unit) transformed normal. This is
00159             // just a dot product.
00160             m_distance = point.dot(m_normal);
00161         }
00162 
00164         bool equals(const Plane<Type> & a_plane, const Type a_tolerance=EPS) const
00165         {
00166             return (m_normal.equal(a_plane.getNormal(),a_tolerance) && 
00167                 (std::abs(m_distance-a_plane.getDistance()) <= a_tolerance) );
00168         }
00169 
00171         Vec4<Type> equation() const
00172         {
00173             return Vec4<Type>(m_normal[0],m_normal[1],m_normal[2], -m_distance);
00174         }
00175 
00177         friend bool operator ==(const Plane<Type> & p1, const Plane<Type> & p2)
00178         { 
00179             return(p1.getDistanceFromOrigin() == p2.getDistanceFromOrigin()&& 
00180                 p1.getNormal() == p2.getNormal()); 
00181         }
00182 
00184         friend bool operator !=(const Plane<Type> & p1, const Plane<Type> & p2)
00185         { 
00186             return !(p1 == p2); 
00187         }
00188 
00193         bool intersect(const Ray<Type> & a_ray, Type & t) const
00194         {
00195             // Check if the ray is parallel to the plane.
00196             Type denom = m_normal.dot(a_ray.getDirection());
00197 
00198             if(denom == (Type)0.0) return false;
00199 
00200             t = (m_distance - m_normal.dot(a_ray.getOrigin())) / denom;
00201 
00202             return true;
00203         }
00204 
00209         bool intersect(const Plane<Type> & a_plane, Ray<Type> & a_ray) const
00210         {
00211             // Based on code from Graphics Gems III, Plane-to-Plane Intersection
00212             // by Priamos Georgiades
00213             const Vec3<Type> & pl1n = m_normal;
00214             const Vec3<Type> & pl2n = a_plane.m_normal;
00215             const Type pl1w = -m_distance;
00216             const Type pl2w = -a_plane.m_distance;
00217 
00218             Vec3<Type> xpt;
00219             Vec3<Type> xdir = pl1n.cross(pl2n);
00220 
00221             // holds the squares of the coordinates of xdir
00222             Vec3<Type> dir2 = xdir * xdir;
00223 
00224             if (dir2[2] > dir2[1] && dir2[2] > dir2[0] && dir2[2] > EPS) {
00225                 // then get a point on the XY plane
00226                 xpt.setValue(pl1n[1] * pl2w - pl2n[1] * pl1w,
00227                     pl2n[0] * pl1w - pl1n[0] * pl2w, 0.0f);
00228                 xpt *= 1.0f / xdir[2];
00229             }
00230             else if (dir2[1] > dir2[0] && dir2[1] > EPS) {
00231                 // then get a point on the XZ plane
00232                 xpt.setValue(pl1n[2] * pl2w - pl2n[2] * pl1w, 0.0f,
00233                     pl2n[0] * pl1w - pl1n[0] * pl2w);
00234                 xpt *= 1.0f / xdir[1];
00235             }
00236             else if (dir2[0] > EPS) {
00237                 // then get a point on the YZ plane
00238                 xpt.setValue(0.0f, pl1n[2] * pl2w - pl2n[2] * pl1w,
00239                     pl2n[1] * pl1w - pl1n[1] * pl2w);
00240                 xpt *= 1.0f / xdir[0];
00241             }
00242             else // xdir is zero, then no point of intersection exists
00243                 return false;
00244 
00245             xdir *= 1.0f / (Type)std::sqrt(dir2[0] + dir2[1] + dir2[2]);
00246 
00247             a_ray.setValue(xpt, xpt+xdir);
00248 
00249             return true;
00250         }
00251 
00256         bool intersect(const Plane<Type> & a_plane1, const Plane<Type> & a_plane2, Vec3<Type> & a_pt) const
00257         {
00258             Vec3<Type> N23 = a_plane1.m_normal.cross(a_plane2.m_normal);
00259 
00260             if(N23.sqrLength() < EPS) return false;
00261 
00262             Vec3<Type> N31 = a_plane2.m_normal.cross(m_normal);
00263 
00264             if(N31.sqrLength() < EPS) return false;
00265 
00266             Vec3<Type> N12 = m_normal.cross(a_plane1.m_normal);
00267 
00268             if(N12.sqrLength() < EPS) return false;
00269 
00270             Type d1 = m_distance;
00271             Type d2 = a_plane1.m_distance;
00272             Type d3 = a_plane2.m_distance;
00273 
00274             a_pt = (d1 * N23 + d2 * N31 + d3 * N12) / m_normal.dot(N23);
00275 
00276             return true;
00277         }
00278 
00279     private:
00280         Vec3<Type> m_normal;    
00281         Type m_distance;                
00282     };
00283 
00284     typedef Plane<int>    Planei;
00285     typedef Plane<float>  Planef;
00286     typedef Plane<double> Planed;
00287 } // namespace gtl

00289 #endif
